summary: ARAF is the story of Zehra and Olgun whose lives are caught in a vacuum! The world in which they live and work is a place of throwaway culture and constant change. They too are waiting for ... See full summary »
cast: Neslihan Atagül|Baris Hacihan|Özcan Deniz|Nihal Yalcin|Ilgaz Kocatürk|Can Basak|Yasemin Çonka|Erol Babaoglu|Feride Karaman
title: Araf
